DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this observational study is to describe the conditions for the concomitant administration of a slow-acting insulin analogue with oral antidiabetics (OADs) in order to improve blood glucose control in type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Describing Conditions for Administering Slow-acting Insulin Analogue With Oral Antidiabetic Agents in Type 2 Diabetes on Blood Glucose Control
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes HbA1c level greater than 7% despite treatment with two (or three) oral antidiabetic drugs (OADs) at an optimal dose level Patient agreeing to take part in the study and capable of completing a selfquestionnaire. Hypersensitivity to insulin or to one of the excipients Treatment with insulin for at least 6 months Participant in a clinical trial for diabetes on entry into the observational study
